content: 3 stitches on the first needle k2tog k1 with the second needle k1 ssk knit to the last 3 stitches on the needle k2tog k1 round 2 k all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 12 16 20 24 28 32 total stitches remain you may adjust this stitch number up or down based on the shape of the recipient s heel as long as your total number of stitches is a multiple of 4 graft the remaining stitches together using the kitchener stitch weave in all ends for personal use only �5 picnic socks for personal use only �6
